long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Bulk Sender – the ultimate solution for hassle-free and unlimited WhatsApp messaging with lifetime validity at a one-time fee! This tool is perfect for businesses managing marketing campaigns, customer service, or bulk Messages, allowing you to automate messaging and broadcast to multiple recipients while ensuring compliance with WhatsApp’s guidelines.

WhatsApp Bulk Sender - Complete Feature List:

50 free broadcast messages per day, reset every 24 hours to send another 50
Unlimited WhatsApp Messaging: Send messages to unlimited contacts.
Unlimited Attachments: Share unlimited files, images, and videos.
Lifetime Access: One-time payment for lifetime service—no recurring fees.
Group Management: Create, edit, delete groups, and select multiple WhatsApp groups for bulk messaging.
Auto Number Formatting: Automatically format numbers with gaps and commas.
Message Templates: Easily create, edit, and delete message templates.
Personalized Messaging: Customize messages with text, images, videos, and documents.
Broadcast Scheduling: Auto-start broadcasts with the option to cancel anytime.
Custom Sending Intervals: Set delays between messages (in seconds) for smooth delivery.
Individual Group Messaging: Automatically message each group member individually.
Broadcast History: View and track the complete history of your broadcasts.
Premium Support: Get priority assistance whenever you need help.


Support:
Need help? Our friendly support team is ready to assist you! Visit our support page at https://whatsapp.bangladeshisoftware.com/support for any questions or troubleshooting. We're dedicated to ensuring that WA Bulk Sender meets all your bulk messaging needs!

Note:
WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. WA Bulk Message Sender is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
